name: Deliverance (itch) (Owzy)
description:
This is an unfinished build, more meant as a progress update. More updates to come :)

A choose your own adventure game set against the backdrop of our vast Milky Way galaxy.

In Deliverance you play as an immortal prisoner aboard the ECG Deliverance, tasked by your handlers to explore the Milky Way system for life, habitable worlds, and most importantly, mineral wealth.

Encounter whole alien civilizations and decide how you will interact with them, come across black holes and other cosmic horrors, and keep yourself alive long enough to see the blue skies of Earth again.
